column4: hey guys listen: finch is pidgin (libpurple) but text. i want to be able to access the finch running on my computer1 from computer2, and by access i mean that i want to be able to use computer1, type a message, then go to computer2 and have exactly the same terminal screen in front of me, and type message two. i tried it with ssh, but when starting finch on computer2, it starts a COMPLETELY NEW INSTANCE. that's not what i want. any ideas?
you want to be able to chat to someone else using the same program? may i ask why you can't use another solution?
no. it's more like vnc what i want, but its all just text, just a terminal, so i dont want any full-blown vnc stuff
what's the ultimate goal though, what do you want to achieve?
